-- | Extra utilities for shake build systems
--   
--   This package is designed to add supporting modules for the Shake build
--   system, that shouldn't be included in the core package.
@package shake-extras
@version 0.1.1


-- | Module to search imports. Imports are files that are needed for
--   compilation of a source code file. (This module is experimental.)
module Development.Shake.Imports

-- | <tt>importsRule p searchImports</tt> registers a rule for how to look
--   up imports for files matching p.
importsRule :: (FilePath -> Bool) -> (FilePath -> Action [FilePath]) -> Rules ()

-- | Registers a defaultRule for imports in haskell source files (".hs").
--   Only returns the imported files that are found on disk in one of the
--   directories specified by the first argument.
importsDefaultHaskell :: [FilePath] -> Rules ()

-- | Registers a defaultRule for imports in C++ source files (".cpp"). Only
--   returns the imported files that are found on disk in one of the
--   directories specified by the first argument.
importsDefaultCpp :: [FilePath] -> Rules ()

-- | Searches for imports in a file. Before compiling, you still have to
--   <a>need</a> the imports.
directImports :: FilePath -> Action [FilePath]

-- | Searches for transitive imports in a file. This might be useful for
--   linking.
transitiveImports :: FilePath -> Action [FilePath]


-- | This module provides a convenient cmdargs style interface for
--   controlling shake build options.
module Development.Shake.CLI

-- | A <a>ShakeOptions</a> data structure with annotations for CmdArgs
--   already included.
options :: ShakeOptions

-- | Build a set of Shake rules, and let cmdargs take care of parsing
--   command line arguments that may influence the used <a>ShakeOptions</a>
shakeWithArgs :: Rules () -> IO ()
